histogram.name: Scanning.CombinedImageSizeInKbBeforePdf
histogram.summary: Records the total size of the scanned images stored in memory right before they are converted into the final PDF.

histogram.name: Scanning.MultiPageScan.CombinedImageSizeInKbBeforePdf
histogram.summary: During a multi-page scan session, records the total size of the scanned images stored in memory at the moment the user clicks save to convert them into the final PDF.

histogram.name: Scanning.MultiPageScan.NumPagesScanned
histogram.summary: Records the number of pages scanned in a saved multi-page scan session.

histogram.name: Scanning.MultiPageScan.PageScanResult
histogram.summary: Records the success status of each page scan in a multi-page scan session.

histogram.name: Scanning.MultiPageScan.PDFGenerationTime
histogram.summary: Records the amount of time it takes from the user clicking save on their multi-page scan session to the PDF file being generated and saved.

histogram.name: Scanning.MultiPageScan.SessionDuration
histogram.summary: Records the time between a user starting the first scan in a multi-page scan session to the time the user clicks save to end the session. This does not record when a multi-page scan session ends prematurely without the PDF being saved.

histogram.name: Scanning.MultiPageScan.ToolbarAction
histogram.summary: Records when a user clicks an action on the action toolbar in a multi-page scan session.

histogram.name: Scanning.NumCompletedScansInSession
histogram.summary: Records the number of completed scans in a single session of the Scan app being open. This value gets recorded whenever the Scan app is closed or refreshed.

histogram.name: Scanning.NumDetectedScanners
histogram.summary: Records the number of detected scanners. Recorded each time detected scanners are received.

histogram.name: Scanning.NumDetectedScannersAtLogin
histogram.summary: Records the number of detected scanners. Recorded after a 5 minute delay after login when the CupsPrintersManager is created.

histogram.name: Scanning.NumFilesCreated
histogram.summary: Records the number of files created in a successful scan.

histogram.name: Scanning.NumPagesScanned
histogram.summary: Records the number of pages scanned in a successful scan.

histogram.name: Scanning.NumScanSettingChanges
histogram.summary: Records the number of scan setting changes before a scan is initiated.

histogram.name: Scanning.PDFGenerationTime
histogram.summary: Records the amount of time it takes from the final document in a scan job being scanned to the PDF file being generated and saved.

histogram.name: Scanning.ReadyTime
histogram.summary: Records the time between sending a request for scanners and receiving capabilities for the selected scanner, which is essentially the time between the user launching the Scan app and being able to interact with it to select a scanner, change scan settings, or start a scan.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanCompleteAction
histogram.summary: Records the action taken by a user after a successful scan job on Chrome OS.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanJobFailureReason
histogram.summary: Records the reason a scan job failed.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanJobSettings.ColorMode
histogram.summary: Records the selected Color Mode setting for a submitted scan job.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanJobSettings.FileType
histogram.summary: Records the selected File Type setting for a submitted scan job.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanJobSettings.PageSize
histogram.summary: Records the selected Page Size setting for a submitted scan job.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanJobSettings.Resolution
histogram.summary: Records the selected Resolution setting for a submitted scan job.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanJobSettings.Source
histogram.summary: Records the selected Source setting for a submitted scan job.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanJobSuccessful
histogram.summary: Records true if the attempted scan job completed successfully and false if the scan job failed for any reason. This metric will not include canceled scan jobs.
